name: PogoChamp (Demo)
description:
PogoChamp is a physics-based 3D platformer inspired by games like QWOP, I Am Bread, and Getting Over It.

Control your character's rotation and jump strength to get to the goal, but make sure not to hit your head!

This demo features 15 levels, there are 100 in the full game. 

Features

  • Unique, easy-to-understand, but tricky to master controls.
  • Fluid, momentum-based movement (once you get the hang of it).
  • 15 levels that constantly remix and iterate on the mechanics.  [100 levels in the full game!]
  • Whacky power-ups that change how you play the game but still maintain the essential controls like: Fish Hat, Hamster Ball, Jetpack, Football, and Bazooka.
  • A dedicated self-destruct button!
  • Varied levels that are designed to be fun and surprising, for example: Pachinko, A Bullfight, Skee-Ball, Giant Mini Golf, A giant video game console, A Piano and more!  [Some only available in the full version]
  • Fully featured In-game Replay System that will show all of your attempts at once.
  • Steam Leaderboards for every level. Leaderboard entries include replays so you can learn from the best!  [Only on Steam version]
  • Multiple challenge target times for each level.
  • Support for Keyboard & Mouse, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Pro, and generic gamepad controllers.
  • Lots of puns!
  • No dialog!
  • Secret completionist objectives. [Only available in full version]
  • A deliberate focus on being more fun than frustrating.
